body.name: UPERFECT 2K Portable Monitor, 16" 2560x1600 QHD Portable Gaming Monitor HDR FreeSync Laptop Monitor w/VESA & Smart Case Matte IPS Eye Care External Second Screen for PC Laptop Phone Game Console
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 3 hrs 33 mins
features: 【2K HDR Portable Monitor】UPERFECT New 16inch portable monitor with 2K Ultra HD 2560*1600 high resolution and HDR. QHD 2560*1600 resolution presenting rich and bright colors and delicate and realistic pictures. Suitable for photo workers, game and movie lovers. Clear and accurate color rendering improves your work efficiency and accuracy.

【16" & 16:10 Screen Ration】UPERFECT 16" portable laptop monitor with a sleek 16:10 screen ratio—over 11% more viewable area than 15.6" 16:9 monitors. Enjoy seamless motion clarity with FreeSync and HDR. Switch between Landscape and Vertical modes for ultimate versatility on the go. Elevate your viewing experience effortlessly.

【IPS Matte Screen with 100% sRGB】UPERFECT portable laptop monitor featuring an IPS screen boasting a wider 178° viewing angle, 350 nits brightness, and an impressive 1200:1 contrast ratio. With 100% sRGB coverage, it displays a stunning array of 1.06 million colors. Not only does it effectively reduce blue light radiation for eye protection, but it also eliminates flickering, ensuring a comfortable and extended viewing.

【Lightweight & Frameless】 Immerse yourself in the ultimate portability and aesthetics with our lightweight and frameless display. Net weight 1.5lb,0.5 inch thickness, three-sided 0.15 inch ultra-narrow bezel design, minimum bezel and seamless views keep you focused on your work. With its thin and light form factor, it's the perfect travel companion for gaming and on-the-go productivity.

【Wide Compatibility & VESA Support】 Built-in standard HDMI port and 2 full-function Type-C ports, the ​portable gaming monitor works with laptops, PCS, phones, tablet, drawing pad and more. Built in VESA(75x75@M4) on the back of monitor that can be mounted on the wall or desktop. Added versatility with a convenient hole design that allows for easy switching between landscape and portrait using the pen quick support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Game-Changer in Portable Monitors - 5/5 Stars!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I've been using the UPERFECT Portable Monitor 18.5 inch, and let me tell you, it's an absolute game-changer. This monitor has truly exceeded my expectations in every way, especially for the price.The 100Hz refresh rate ensures that every frame appears smoothly and quickly, giving you the upper hand in fast-paced games. FreeSync virtually eliminates screen tearing and stuttering, making for an incredibly fluid gaming experience.Secondly, while other brands might offer lower specs, this freestanding monitor boasts a 350cd/m² brightness, 100% sRGB, and 72% NTSC coverage. The result is a clearer, brighter, and crisper images that reveal more details and vibrant colors.This monitor also offers strong versatility with a mini HDMI port and two USB-C 3.1 ports, you can connect it to your laptop, PC, Phone, PS3, PS4, Wii, Steam Deck, Switch, etc. It's compatible with most laptops, including Dell, Surface, Macbook, Lenovo, HP and many others.UPERFECT's design is evident in their slimmest 18.5-inch USB-C monitor that's just 0.2 inches thin. The integrated VESA and adjustable kickstand make this portable laptop monitor incredibly convenient. It's the ideal travel companion for laptops and phones, serving as a second or dual screen to maximize your work efficiency and simplify your setup.The screen is crafted from high-quality Aluminum Alloy material, that looks very nice. It excels in performance, image quality, and compatibility, all while boasting an innovative design and exceptional customer support. If you're in the market for a portable monitor that truly stands out, look no further. This monitor is a game-changer, and I wholeheartedly give it 5/5 stars!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid Portable Monitor
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is the second portable monitor I've purchased. They are a lot more useful than you might first realize. The first was 16" and 1080P with 60hz refresh rate. I really liked that monitor, and so did my girlfriend so we decided to upgrade. I gave her the 16" model and kept this larger one for myself. We both have been very pleased with their performance. There haven't been any issues with the display or function. She uses the monitor as a dex/samsung computer thing and I think that's a great way to utilize these portable monitors. I keep this 17.3" on a side table and use it for retro gaming and for my raspberry pi. I'll try to provide the rest of the world with my findings:Picture: 5/5It's 1080 @ 60hz - The picture is very clear. I don't have issues with glare, or viewing angles. It is also pretty bright, I have the brightness set to 100% for the video in this review - but normally it's nowhere near that. I keep it around half way or even less if it's dark in the room I'm in.Bezels & Sturdiness: 5/5The frame is solid, it feels textured - like a good powder coat or anodized aluminum. I like that the bottom doesn't have a big brand logo, it's just plain old black and it looks elegant and modern compared to some of the other brands I've seen. The buttons feel sturdy. I'd prefer a different button arrangement for the menu/settings but the switch-button it has is at least intuitive and sturdy. It's a preference thing and doesn't detract from the monitor.Sound: 5/5I was surprised by the quality of the two 1 watt speakers. They don't sound like a tin can, they sound like a quality speaker. I have watched some movies and tv shows, but mostly I play games with mine and it sounds great. I keep the volume around 16 or 17, it goes up to 100 and offers plenty of volume.Price: 5/5This is a great deal because you get a monitor, AC power adapter, a case and 3 cables.The carrying case is one place most people will either upgrade or get a replacement. It functions, the magnets work well and it holds up but it feels a bit, meh... I mean, if you get a nice monitor like this, you should also make sure it's safe when you're traveling with it. I have an old laptop bag it fits in nicely. I also use a stand when I'm at home, so I don't use the one it came with. The one it comes with functions and yeah, it will protect the screen- but I like the adjustable ones that are solid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars UPERFECT 18.5" (1080p): It is absolutely perfect as a portable second monitor for office work.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this monitor because I am planning to travel overseas and will have to work from another person's home for a month without any office setup already present.I use a lot of spreadsheets and web pages with complicated dashboards and a 14-15" laptop screen simply doesn't cut it for me. I may watch some videos, but I don't plan to use this for gaming so I cannot comment on that.Pros:-For a monitor, it is surprisingly light on its own (without all the cables and accessories).-Super easy to set up. You plug it in and it's on. I was not able to use the USB-C cable provided (it didn't work with my Lenovo i7 Slim through any of the Thunderbolt ports), but the mini-HDMI to HDMI cable worked with no problem.-It has speakers! Does this thing have incredibly rich sound? No. Would you be able to sit through a movie or an episode or two of some show? Absolutely, yes.-Nice crisp screen, no obvious hotspots, no burnt-out pixels detected.-Smart cover to protect the monitor and it works a pretty decent stand in itself.Cons (personally, none of these are dealbreakers for me):-The USB-C to USB-C cables (2 provided) are pretty short for a charging cable. Get yourself a good quality longer cable.-The provided cover will not protect the monitor during serious travel: I would not just place it in my carry-on because something will gouge the screen, or it will get twisted (it is pretty large and fairly thin). I am planning to use the box it came in as a travel case during my flights. This will make it pretty heavy, but also pretty well protected.-While it is surprisingly light for what it is, I would not want to walk long distances with it in my backpack or commute on public transport (if you only use the smart cover and someone bumps into your back on the subway, this thing is toast). I think this is all very reasonable though: you cannot expect to have a very portable monitor that's almost 19 inches and just throw it around. You have got to baby this one.-This last one is very subjective: the prongs of the charging block are foldable, and they are pretty difficult to open up with long nails (I know I will break a nail or two down the line, unless it gets easier or looser as time goes on).

El monitor cumple con lo esperado, en relación a la funda magnética no sostiene de una manera firme en monitor. En mi caso tuve que comprar un soporte vesa para poder estar confiado que el monitor no se caiga

J'ai acheté cet écran pour avoir un second monitor sur mon pc et pour pouvoir jouer sur ma xbox.La boite contient :L'écran2 câbles usb-c1 câble hdmiPour ce qui est de l'écran la colorimétrie affiche de belles couleurs, mais pour le hdr le pic lumineux est de 410 nits ( 8 bits + frc ) un hdr gadget à mon sens, le contraste est cohérent à la dalle IPS 1200:1 c'est conforme à mes attentes, j'en attendais pas plus de ce produit, l'écran est satisfaisant pour mes besoins : Bureautique et jeux vidéo, je n'ai pas constatée de déchirure d'image lors de mes sessions de jeux tout répond correctement sans en ressentir d'input lag conséquent.En ce qui concerne son poids, il est léger et transportable.Je recommande cet écran, c'est un bon rapport qualité prix, petit bonus : Très bon service client, il ne faut pas hésiter à les contacter en cas de problème !

reviews.reviewTitle: Très bon écran, et SAV efficace
reviews.reviewText: Très content de cet écran que j'ai acheté pour son côté pratique.Qualité d'affichage impeccable, luminosité très correcte (je l'ai baissée à moitié).Je préciser, il sert uniquement en bureautique, je n'ai pas testé avec d'autres utilisations.Suite à un problème de sortie de veille de l'écran avec mon MacBook Pro j'ai contacté le SAV, qui après quelque demandes d'info ma envoyé un bon de retour et m'a retourné un modèle neuf.Contact très pro et très réactif.

reviews.reviewTitle: Gran producto y excelente servicio al cliente.
reviews.reviewText: Excelente producto por el precio y el equipo de servicio al cliente es extremadamente útil.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The colour was good enough (not for professional work, but wide enough to not have washed out colours), albeit too red upon unboxing, had to tune through the osd (also, is listed as 500 nits but felt like 450ish? as it was visibly dimmer than the Legion 7, maybe just a minor deviation). Build quality could be better, but it was light anyway. Backlight bleed was very visible on dark content and dark rooms, not too obvious on daylight or bright rooms. Works great for anything but colour sensitive task.
